summary: In this context, 1,1,2,2-tetrachloroethene is mentioned as one of the chloro-organic compounds being monitored for exposure, alongside other volatile organic compounds (VOCs). The study focuses on the measurement of these organic chemicals, particularly their potential toxicity to the liver. However, the specific relationship between 1,1,2,2-tetrachloroethene and the broader category of organic chemicals is not elaborated upon beyond its classification as a VOC.
